rows.label: qst700808_msg0001
rows.name:
Honestly... So it was
your doing after all.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0002
rows.name:
When I was at the shop, you
were such good kids and kept
me company, weren't you?

rows.label: qst700808_msg0003
rows.name:
That's right. There's no need
for you all to run away.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0004
rows.name:
It's not like I'm going
to catch and eat you...

rows.label: qst700808_msg0005
rows.name:
Eat Ryuuryuu and the
others!? Th-This big sister
is scary after all, mo!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0006
rows.name: Please forgive us, mo!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0007
rows.name: P-Please don't eat us, mo!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0008
rows.name: Sheesh! I said I won't eat you!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0009
rows.name: Now, now, calm down.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0010
rows.name: ...There was a reason, wasn't there?

rows.label: qst700808_msg0011
rows.name:
You only scattered trash on
the days the old woman went
for a walk, didn't you?

rows.label: qst700808_msg0012
rows.name: Eh? Does that mean...

rows.label: qst700808_msg0013
rows.name: ...She looked lonely, mo.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0014
rows.name:
H-Hey! Don't say
unnecessary things, mo!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0015
rows.name:
Old granny... when she was at
the shop, she was always so kind
and cheerful to everyone, mo.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0016
rows.name:
Komeme and the others had so much
fun, we went to her shop every day
even when we had no reason to, mo.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0017
rows.name: ...But.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0018
rows.name:
When she stopped coming to the shop,
grandma was always alone, mo...

rows.label: qst700808_msg0019
rows.name:
She'd go to that forest and
always just stare at the
sky all by herself, mo!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0020
rows.name: So...

rows.label: qst700808_msg0021
rows.name:
So, to keep the old granny
from being lonely...

rows.label: qst700808_msg0022
rows.name:
But you were too embarrassed to talk
to her directly, so you hid and played
pranks like that, didn't you?

rows.label: qst700808_msg0023
rows.name:
N-No, mo! Ryuuryuu and the
others just wanted to trouble
grandma, that's all, mo!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0024
rows.name:
All right, all right.
We'll leave it at that.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0025
rows.name: You kids...

rows.label: qst700808_msg0026
rows.name:
Thank you. But you're
mistaken about one thing.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0027
rows.name: Mistaken, mo?

rows.label: qst700808_msg0028
rows.name:
You see, I really do like walking
alone; I wasn't lonely at all.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0029
rows.name: I-Is that so, mo!?

rows.label: qst700808_msg0030
rows.name:
Then we'll stop dumping
trash, mo. Ryuuryuu and the
others were so clumsy, mo.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0031
rows.name:
And from now on, what Ryuuryuu and
the others really want to do...

rows.label: qst700808_msg0032
rows.name:
What only we four brothers can
do, we'll think about it just
a little bit, seriously, mo.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0033
rows.name: And and...

rows.label: qst700808_msg0034
rows.name:
I guess we'll just have to
come and see your face from
time to time, grandma, mo!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0035
rows.name: Yes, I'll look forward to it.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0036
rows.name: Yay, mo!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0037
rows.name: Big bro is just not being honest, mo!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0038
rows.name: A happy ending, a happy ending, mo!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0039
rows.name: Y-You guys, be quiet, mo!

rows.label: qst700808_msg0040
rows.name: ...I'm indebted to you all as well.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0041
rows.name:
Now I can enjoy a pleasant
walk without any worries.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0042
rows.name: Thank you so much.

rows.label: qst700808_msg0043
rows.name:
You're welcome. You Nopon, be
good to the old woman, okay!
